markdownRemark.html: Big day! In a quest for feedback, I decided I needed to get Harvy in front of more people. Being in the IndieHackers community, I posted Harvy looking for feedback and questions. Check out the post and let me know what you think!

frontmatter.title: Harvy on IndieHackers
